General.Name: Lucy Scientific Discovery Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Lucy Scientific Discovery Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of psychedelic products. It offers biological raw materials, active pharmaceutical ingredients, and finished biopharmaceutical products. The company was formerly known as Hollyweed North Cannabis Inc. and changed its name to Lucy Scientific Discovery Inc. in May 2021. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Victoria, Canada.
